description: Erection of a single storey wrap around extension and construction of glass box to first floor.
decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;padding:0pt 0pt 8pt 0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#222222;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to superstructure works, a scheme for the provision and implementation </span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">of flood resilient and resistant construction details and measures for the site </span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">against surface water flood risk shall be submitted to and approved in writing with </span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">the LPA in consultation with the LLFA prior to the construction of the measures. </span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The scheme shall be carried out in its entirety before the extension is occupied </span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">and; constructed and completed in accordance with the approved plans in line </span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">with current best practices.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;padding:0pt 0pt 8pt 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To mitigate the risk of flooding and reduce surface water to the site and surrounding area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;padding:0pt 0pt 10pt 0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification and a drainage layout of at least one suitable sustainable drainage systems (i.e. water butt, raingarden, bioretention planter box, living roof (substrate depth of 80-150mm excluding the vegetative mat), permeable paving, etc.) shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-4f4a6883-7fff-a9ef-b1bb-2be90a662a78"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: </span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">To protect and where possible enhance biodiversity leading to a net gain.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size, colour, bond, pointing, coursing, jointing, profile and texture.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-32d7c06f-7fff-4f39-83e1-4dffe4b27ad1"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.44;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To preserve the character and appearance of the host building and wider street scene.</span></p>
